attributes.action: AMEND THE RULES GOVERNING SEAFARERS EARNINGS DEDUCTION (SED).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The tax should Not be taken away from anyone who works offshore as the sacrafice we all make in this industry to make a living people who work onshore
have nightmares about.ie no family with us,risk of death very high,prisoners have better conditions and more freedom.
Family problems,stress,the list goes on and on.We need and depend on our tax.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
